code: import React,{Component}from'react';import PubSub from'pubsub-js';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default class Footer extends Component{constructor(){super(...arguments);this.state={done:2,total:4,mouse:false};this.allDone=e=>{PubSub.publish('allDone',e.target.checked);};this.enter=e=>{return()=>{this.setState({mouse:e});};};}componentDidMount(){this.footer=PubSub.subscribe('footer',(msg,data)=>{this.setState({total:data.length});const done=data.reduce((acum,cur)=>acum+(cur.done?1:0),0);this.setState({done:done});});}componentWillUnmount(){PubSub.unsubscribe(this.footer);}deleteAllDone(){PubSub.publish('deleteAllDone');}render(){const{total,done,mouse}=this.state;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("footer",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"list-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"list-group-item footer",onMouseLeave:this.enter(false),onMouseEnter:this.enter(true),style:{background:mouse?"#FFDDCA":"white"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:e=>this.input=e,onChange:this.allDone,type:"checkbox",checked:total===done&&total!==0?true:false}),"\xA0",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["done ",done]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["/ total ",total]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"btn btn-warning",onClick:this.deleteAllDone,children:"Delete all done"})]})});}}
